name: SmartScreen DevContainer (Python + Node)
updateContentCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && if [ -f packages.txt ]; then sudo xargs apt install -y < packages.txt; fi && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install --user -r requirements.txt; fi
postCreateCommand: export NVM_DIR=/usr/local/share/nvm && . $NVM_DIR/nvm.sh && nvm install 20 && nvm alias default 20 && npm install -g @google/gemini-cli
